name: Featured category
help: This component helps to display a group of products from a specific category of your store. You can decide how many products you want to show on the settings.

autoplay_speed.name: Autoplay speed
autoplay_speed.help: Time that takes to pass from one 'Block' to the next, in seconds.

enable_arrows.name: Enable arrows
enable_arrows.help: Displays 'next' and 'previous' arrows for customers to navigate.

enable_dots.name: Enable dots
enable_dots.help: Displays navigational dots (points) for customers to navigate.

highlight_color.name: Highlight color
highlight_color.help: This color is for the button and the highlighted line.
